item.title: My pup Theo <3
item.description: Meet my 7 month old Chow Chow, Theo!

item.title: Python, R, & Reticulate
item.description: Introduction: Using what we learned throughout this past fall semester in SDS348, here are some cool things you can do using R and Python, individually, as well as together using reticulate! Lists & Indexing in Python: list1=['I','love','my', 'dog', 'Theo', 'me', 'loves'] list1[0:5] ## ['I', 'love', 'my', 'dog', 'Theo'] list1.append('and') list1[-1] ## 'and' list1[2:5] ## ['my', 'dog', 'Theo'] list1[6] ## 'loves' list1[5] ## 'me' Using Strings in Python and R:
